column4: does anyone know in gedit, when you type to the left of something, what stops it deleting the character to the right?
is there a good wysiwyg editor around?? i heard of nv something
a powerful little app. wget -c <url> for resumeable downloads also.
that small little c has saved me so much time
it's one for the keyring that's for sure..
plus wget maxes out my connection prety much every time =)
you can use wget --limit-rate=<rate> if it's choking your line..
nope, its fine, i like it maxing my connection, normally if im downloading i want it full speed
especially as i normally leave it downloading 2gig+ files
